for i in 1 ... 2 { turnLeft() } }for i in 1 ... 4 { moveForward() if !isOnGem{ turnLeft() for i in 1 ... 2 { moveForward() } collectGem() turnAround() for i in 1 ... 2 { moveForward() } turnLeft() } else{ collectGem() }} éä¹‹èºæ—‹1234567for i in 1 ... 13 { moveForward() if isBlocked{ turnLeft() }}toggleSwitch() æ£€æŸ¥è¿™ä¸ªä¸é‚£ä¸ª12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031for i in 1 ... 7 { moveForward() if isOnGem && !isBlockedLeft{ collectGem() } else if isOnGem && isBlockedLeft{ turnRight() for i in 1 ... 2 { moveForward() } func backLine(){ func turnAround(){ for i in 1 ... 2 { turnLeft() } } turnAround() for i in 1 ... 2 { moveForward() } } if isOnClosedSwitch{ toggleSwitch() } backLine() if isOnGem { collectGem() } turnRight() }} æ£€æŸ¥è¿™ä¸ªæˆ–é‚£ä¸ª1234567for i in 1 ... 12 { moveForward() if isBlocked || isBlockedLeft{ turnRight() }}collectGem() é€»è¾‘è¿·å®«1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435for i in 1 ... 8 { moveForward() if isOnGem && isOnClosedSwitch{ collectGem() toggleSwitch() turnRight() for i in 1 ... 2 { moveForward() } collectGem() func turnAround(){ for i in 1 ... 2 { turnRight() } } turnAround() for i in 1 ... 2 { moveForward() } turnRight() } else if isBlocked && isOnClosedSwitch{ toggleSwitch() turnLeft() } else if isOnGem || isOnClosedSwitch{ if isOnGem{ collectGem() } else if isOnClosedSwitch{ turnLeft() toggleSwitch() } }} While å¾ªç¯å½“â€¦æ—¶è¿è¡Œä»£ç 1234while isOnCloseSwitch() { toggleSwitch() moveForward()} åˆ›å»ºæ›´å·§å¦™çš„ While å¾ªç¯12345678910moveForward()while !isBlocked { if isOnOpenSwitch { moveForward() } else{ toggleSwitch() moveForward() }} æ­£ç¡®é€‰å–å·¥å…·12345678910func turnAndCollectGem() { moveForward() turnLeft() moveForward() collectGem() turnRight()}while !isBlocked { turnAndCollectGem()} å››ä¹˜ä»¥å››123456789while !isBlocked { moveForward() if isOnClosedSwitch { toggleSwitch() } if (isBlockedLeft || isBlocked) && isOnOpenSwitch{ turnRight() }} è½¬èº«12345678910while !isBlocked { moveForward() if isOnGem && isBlocked{ collectGem() turnLeft() } else if !isOnGem{ turnRight() }} å¯Œé¥¶ä¹‹åœ°123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627while !isBlocked { moveForward() if isOnGem || isOnClosedSwitch{ if isOnGem{ collectGem() } else if isOnClosedSwitch{ toggleSwitch() } } else if isBlocked{ if isBlockedLeft { turnRight() moveForward() turnRight() } else if isBlockedRight { turnRight() } else{ turnLeft() moveForward() turnLeft() } }} åµŒå¥—å¾ªç¯1234567while isOnGem || isBlockedLeft { while isOnGemm { turnLeft() collectGem() } moveForward()} éšæœºçŸ©å½¢1234567while !isBlocked{ moveForward() if isBlocked { turnRight() }}toggleSwitch() å§‹ç»ˆå³è½¬1234567891011121314while !isBlocked{ moveForward() if isOnClosedSwitch || isOnGem{ if isOnClosedSwitch{ toggleSwitch() } else{ collectGem() } } else if isBlocked && isBlockedLeft{ turnRight() }} ç®—æ³•å³æ‰‹å®šåˆ™123456789101112131415161718192021func navigateAroundWall() { if isBlockedRight{ moveForward() } else { turnRight() moveForward() }}while !isOnClosedSwitch{ navigateAroundWall() if isOnGem{ collectGem() func turnAround() { for i in 1 ... 2 { turnLeft() } } turnAround() }}toggleSwitch() è°ƒæ•´ç®—æ³•1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132func navigateAroundWall() { if !isBlocked{ if isBlockedRight{ moveForward() } else{ turnRight() moveForward() } } else if isBlocked{ if isBlockedRight { turnLeft() moveForward() } else{ turnRight() moveForward() } }} while !isOnClosedSwitch { navigateAroundWall() if isOnGem { collectGem() turnLeft() turnLeft() }}toggleSwitch() å¾æœè¿·å®«1234567891011121314151617181920while !isOnGem{ if !isBlocked{ moveForward() if isBlockedRight{ isBlockedLeft } else if !isBlockedRight{ turnRight() } } else if isBlocked{ if isBlockedRight { turnLeft() } else{ turnRight() } }}collectGem() å·¦è½¬è¿˜æ˜¯å³è½¬ï¼Ÿ12345678910111213141516while !isOnGem{ moveForward() if !isOnOpenSwitch{ if isOnClosedSwitch{ if !isBlocked{ toggleSwitch() turnRight() } else{ toggleSwitch() turnLeft() } } }}collectGem() å‘å·¦èµ°ï¼Œå‘å³èµ°123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627while !isOnOpenSwitch{ if isOnGem || isOnClosedSwitch{ if isOnGem{ collectGem() } else{ toggleSwitch() } } if isBlocked{ if isBlockedRight{ turnLeft() moveForward() } else if isOnOpenSwitch && isBlocked{ turnLeft() moveForward() } else{ turnRight() moveForward() } } else{ moveForward() }}

posts.text: åŸæ ‡é¢˜ã€Šç”¨Pythonåšä¸ªæµ·é‡å°å§å§ç´ æå›¾ã€‹[1]ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡åªä»‹ç»å¦‚ä½•å®ç°ç´ æé£æ ¼å¹¶è´´å‡ºå…·ä½“ä»£ç ã€‚ èƒŒæ™¯ä»‹ç» ä»Šå¤©åˆ·æ‰‹æœºçœ‹åˆ°å¾®ä¿¡å…¬ä¼—å·ä¸Šè¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰è›®æœ‰æ„æ€çš„ï¼Œé‡Œé¢è´´å‡ºäº†å¤§è‡´æ€è·¯å’Œç›¸å…³çš„OpenCV2ç‰‡æ®µä»£ç ã€‚ç„¶åç§‰ç€å¥½å¥‡çš„å¿ƒå°±æƒ³æ¥è¯•è¯•çœ‹ï¼Œæ²¡æƒ³åˆ°çœŸçš„æˆåŠŸå•¦ï¼Œä¸‹é¢å°±ç›´æ¥è´´å‡ºæ•ˆæœå›¾å’Œå…·ä½“ä»£ç ï¼Œæ³¨é‡Šåšåˆ†æã€‚ åŸå›¾ç´ æ åŸå›¾ æ¼«ç”»é£æ ¼ æ¼«ç”» 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051//ä»£ç æ€è·¯ï¼šå½©è‰²åŸå›¾ > è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºç°åº¦å›¾ > å‡å€¼æ»¤æ³¢æ¨¡ç³Šå¤„ç† > è‡ªé€‚åº”äºŒå€¼åŒ–ä¸ºç™½åº•é»‘å›¾#include <iostream>#include <opencv2/core/core.hpp>#include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>#include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>using namespace std;using namespace cv;int main(){ Mat srcImage = imread("1.jpeg"); if (!srcImage.data) { cout << "è¯»å–å›¾ç‰‡é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®è·¯å¾„ï¼\n"; system("pause"); return -1; } imshow("ORIGINAL", srcImage); Mat srcGray; cvtColor(srcImage, srcGray, CV_RGB2GRAY); imshow("GRAY", srcGray); Mat tempImage; medianBlur(srcGray,tempImage,5); const int maxVal = 255; //åˆå§‹åŒ–å‚æ•° int blockSize = 3; //å–å€¼3ã€5ã€7....ç­‰ int constValue = 2; int adaptiveMethod = 0; int thresholdType = 0; /* è‡ªé€‚åº”é˜ˆå€¼ç®—æ³• 0:ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C 1:ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C -------------------------------------- é˜ˆå€¼ç±»å‹ 0:THRESH_BINARY 1:THRESH_BINARY_INV */ Mat adapImage; adaptiveThreshold(tempImage, adapImage, maxVal, adaptiveMethod, thresholdType, blockSize, constValue); imshow("ADDAPTIVE", adapImage); imwrite("adap.jpeg",adapImage); waitKey(0); return 0;} å†™å®é£æ ¼ å†™å® 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031//ä»£ç æ€è·¯ï¼šå½©è‰²åŸå›¾ > è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºç°åº¦å›¾ > é«˜æ–¯æ»¤æ³¢æ¨¡ç³Šå¤„ç† > ç°åº¦å›¾ä¸é«˜æ–¯å›¾åšä¸ªç®€å•çš„å‡æ³•#include <iostream>#include <opencv2/core/core.hpp>#include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>#include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>using namespace std;using namespace cv;int main(){ Mat srcImage = imread("1.jpeg"); //è½½å…¥å›¾åƒ imshow("ORIGINAL",srcImage); Mat grayImage; cvtColor(srcImage, grayImage, CV_RGB2GRAY); imshow("GRAY",grayImage); Mat gaussImage; GaussianBlur(grayImage,gaussImage,Size(21,21),0,0); imshow("GAUSS",gaussImage); Mat dstImage; divide(grayImage,gaussImage,dstImage,255,-1); imshow("DST",dstImage); imwrite("DST.jpeg",dstImage); waitKey(0); return 0;} æˆåŠŸå¤ç° æˆåŠŸ å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥1. ç”¨ Python åšä¸ªæµ·é‡å°å§å§ç´ æå›¾
